mn6:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn6:2.1: “Sampannasila, bhikkhave, viharatha sampannapatimokkha; patimokkhasamvarasamvuta viharatha acaragocarasampanna anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavino; samadaya sikkhatha sikkhapadesu.
mn6:3.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘sabrahmacarinam piyo ca assam manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari ajjhattam cetosamathamanuyutto anirakatajjhano vipassanaya samannagato bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:4.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘labhi assam civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharanan’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari ajjhattam cetosamathamanuyutto anirakatajjhano vipassanaya samannagato bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:5.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘yesaham civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharam paribhunjami tesam te kara mahapphala assu mahanisamsa’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari ajjhattam cetosamathamanuyutto anirakatajjhano vipassanaya samannagato bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:6.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘ye mam nati salohita peta kalankata pasannacitta anussaranti tesam tam mahapphalam assa mahanisamsan’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari ajjhattam cetosamathamanuyutto anirakatajjhano vipassanaya samannagato bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:7.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘aratiratisaho assam, na ca mam arati saheyya, uppannam aratim abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyyan’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari …pe… bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:8.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘bhayabheravasaho assam, na ca mam bhayabheravam saheyya, uppannam bhayabheravam abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyyan’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari …pe… bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:9.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi assam akicchalabhi akasiralabhi’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari …pe… bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:10.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘ye te santa vimokkha atikkamma rupe aruppa, te kayena phusitva vihareyyan’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari …pe… bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:11.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sotapanno assam avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari …pe… bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:12.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagami assam sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam kareyyan’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari …pe… bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:13.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatiko assam tattha parinibbayi anavattidhammo tasma loka’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari …pe… bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:14.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhaveyyam—ekopi hutva bahudha assam, bahudhapi hutva eko assam; avibhavam tirobhavam; tirokuttam tiropakaram tiropabbatam asajjamano gaccheyyam, seyyathapi akase; pathaviyapi ummujjanimujjam kareyyam, seyyathapi udake; udakepi abhijjamane gaccheyyam, seyyathapi pathaviyam; akasepi pallankena kameyyam, seyyathapi pakkhi sakuno; imepi candimasuriye evammahiddhike evammahanubhave panina paramaseyyam parimajjeyyam; yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteyyan’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari …pe… bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:15.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘dibbaya sotadhatuya visuddhaya atikkantamanusikaya ubho sadde suneyyam—dibbe ca manuse ca ye dure santike ca’ti, silesvevassa paripurakari …pe… bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:16.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘parasattanam parapuggalanam cetasa ceto paricca pajaneyyam—
mn6:16.2: saragam va cittam saragam cittanti pajaneyyam,
mn6:16.3: vitaragam va cittam vitaragam cittanti pajaneyyam;
mn6:16.4: sadosam va cittam sadosam cittanti pajaneyyam,
mn6:16.5: vitadosam va cittam vitadosam cittanti pajaneyyam;
mn6:16.6: samoham va cittam samoham cittanti pajaneyyam,
mn6:16.7: vitamoham va cittam vitamoham cittanti pajaneyyam;
mn6:16.8: sankhittam va cittam sankhittam cittanti pajaneyyam,
mn6:16.9: vikkhittam va cittam vikkhittam cittanti pajaneyyam;
mn6:16.10: mahaggatam va cittam mahaggatam cittanti pajaneyyam,
mn6:16.11: amahaggatam va cittam amahaggatam cittanti pajaneyyam;
mn6:16.12: sauttaram va cittam sauttaram cittanti pajaneyyam,
mn6:16.13: anuttaram va cittam anuttaram cittanti pajaneyyam;
mn6:16.14: samahitam va cittam samahitam cittanti pajaneyyam,
mn6:16.15: asamahitam va cittam asamahitam cittanti pajaneyyam;
mn6:16.16: vimuttam va cittam vimuttam cittanti pajaneyyam,
mn6:16.17: avimuttam va cittam avimuttam cittanti pajaneyyan’ti,
mn6:17.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussareyyam, seyyathidam—ekampi jatim dvepi jatiyo tissopi jatiyo catassopi jatiyo pancapi jatiyo dasapi jatiyo visampi jatiyo timsampi jatiyo cattalisampi jatiyo pannasampi jatiyo jatisatampi jatisahassampi jati satasahassampi anekepi samvattakappe anekepi vivattakappe anekepi samvattavivattakappe—amutrasim evamnamo evangotto evamvanno evamaharo evamsukhadukkhappatisamvedi evamayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapadim; tatrapasim evamnamo evangotto evamvanno evamaharo evamsukhadukkhappatisamvedi evamayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhupapannoti. Iti sakaram sauddesam anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussareyyan’ti,
mn6:18.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passeyyam cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne sugate duggate yathakammupage satte pajaneyyam—ime vata bhonto satta kayaduccaritena samannagata vaciduccaritena samannagata manoduccaritena samannagata ariyanam upavadaka micchaditthika micchaditthikammasamadana, te kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna; ime va pana bhonto satta kayasucaritena samannagata vacisucaritena samannagata manosucaritena samannagata ariyanam anupavadaka sammaditthika sammaditthikammasamadana, te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapannati, iti dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passeyyam cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne sugate duggate yathakammupage satte pajaneyyan’ti,
mn6:18.2: silesvevassa paripurakari ajjhattam cetosamathamanuyutto anirakatajjhano vipassanaya samannagato bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:19.1: Akankheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu: ‘asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyyan’ti,
mn6:19.2: silesvevassa paripurakari ajjhattam cetosamathamanuyutto anirakatajjhano vipassanaya samannagato bruheta sunnagaranam.
mn6:20.1: ‘Sampannasila, bhikkhave, viharatha sampannapatimokkha; patimokkhasamvarasamvuta viharatha acaragocarasampanna anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavino; samadaya sikkhatha sikkhapadesu’ti—
mn6:20.2: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttan”ti.
mn6:20.4: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
